attributes.additional_details:
We all know that Battlefield 4 needs something good, dinosaur mode would bring the spark needed for Battlefield to overcome Cod as the main FPS.

Imagine it though, your in a jet fighting off pterodactyls or a tank fighting off T-Rex's or on the ground shooting V raptors?

It would be like COD zombies in the way it generated a change in the game and kept the franchise going.

We need this.

Help and lets get the the battlefield developers to see this, let them do their magic and make this sh*t work!
